storyTitle: As Employee, I want to submit schedule change requests to achieve timely updates to my work schedule

testCases.title: Validate successful schedule change request submission with valid data
preconditions: Employee has valid login credentials
Scheduling portal is accessible and operational
Employee has a valid work schedule in the system
Supporting document is available and under 10MB in size

steps.action: Navigate to the scheduling portal login page and enter valid employee credentials
steps.expectedResult: Employee is successfully authenticated and redirected to the scheduling portal dashboard

steps.action: Click on the 'Schedule Change Request' menu option or button
steps.expectedResult: Schedule change request form is displayed with all mandatory fields clearly marked

steps.action: Fill in the 'Date' field with a current or future date
steps.expectedResult: Date field accepts the input and displays the selected date in the correct format

steps.action: Fill in the 'Time' field with the desired schedule time
steps.expectedResult: Time field accepts the input and displays the selected time

steps.action: Fill in the 'Reason' field with a valid explanation for the schedule change
steps.expectedResult: Reason field accepts the text input without validation errors

steps.action: Click on the 'Attach Document' button and select a valid document file under 10MB
steps.expectedResult: Document is successfully uploaded and file name is displayed in the attachment section

steps.action: Click the 'Submit' button to submit the schedule change request
steps.expectedResult: System processes the request within 2 seconds, saves the data to ScheduleChangeRequests table, and displays a confirmation message with timestamp and request ID

steps.action: Verify the confirmation message contains request details and submission timestamp
steps.expectedResult: Confirmation message displays all submitted information including date, time, reason, and unique request identifier

postconditions: Schedule change request is saved in the ScheduleChangeRequests table with status 'Pending'
Request is timestamped with current date and time
Attached document is stored securely and linked to the request
Employee can view the submitted request in their request history
Request is available for approver review

testCases.title: Reject submission with missing mandatory fields
preconditions: Employee has valid login credentials
Scheduling portal is accessible and operational
Employee is authenticated and on the schedule change request form

steps.action: Navigate to the schedule change request form after successful login
steps.expectedResult: Schedule change request form is displayed with all mandatory fields marked with asterisks or 'required' indicators

steps.action: Leave the 'Date' field empty
steps.expectedResult: Date field remains empty without any value

steps.action: Leave the 'Reason' field empty
steps.expectedResult: Reason field remains empty without any text

steps.action: Click the 'Submit' button without filling mandatory fields
steps.expectedResult: System prevents form submission and displays inline error messages next to each empty mandatory field indicating 'This field is required' or similar validation message

steps.action: Verify that no data is saved to the database
steps.expectedResult: No new record is created in the ScheduleChangeRequests table and submission is blocked

steps.action: Fill in the 'Date' field with a valid current or future date
steps.expectedResult: Date field accepts the input and error message for date field is cleared

steps.action: Fill in the 'Reason' field with a valid explanation
steps.expectedResult: Reason field accepts the text and error message for reason field is cleared

steps.action: Fill in the 'Time' field with a valid time
steps.expectedResult: Time field accepts the input and all validation errors are cleared

steps.action: Click the 'Submit' button with all mandatory fields completed
steps.expectedResult: System successfully validates the form, saves the request, and displays confirmation message with request details

postconditions: Schedule change request is saved in the database only after all mandatory fields are filled
Employee receives confirmation of successful submission
Request is timestamped and available for approval processing

testCases.title: Handle attachment size limit enforcement
preconditions: Employee has valid login credentials and is authenticated
Schedule change request form is accessible
Test files are prepared: one file larger than 10MB and one file within the 10MB limit
Employee is on the schedule change request form page

steps.action: Navigate to the schedule change request form and fill in all mandatory fields with valid data
steps.expectedResult: All mandatory fields are populated with valid information and form is ready for attachment

steps.action: Click on the 'Attach Document' or 'Browse' button
steps.expectedResult: File selection dialog opens allowing user to browse and select files

steps.action: Select a file larger than 10MB from the file system
steps.expectedResult: System detects the file size exceeds the 10MB limit and displays an error message stating 'File size exceeds maximum allowed size of 10MB' or similar, preventing the upload

steps.action: Verify that the oversized file is not attached to the form
steps.expectedResult: No file name appears in the attachment section and the attachment field remains empty

steps.action: Click on the 'Attach Document' button again
steps.expectedResult: File selection dialog opens again for new file selection

steps.action: Select a valid file that is within the 10MB size limit (e.g., 5MB file)
steps.expectedResult: File is successfully uploaded and the file name is displayed in the attachment section without any error messages

steps.action: Verify the attachment indicator shows the uploaded file name and size
steps.expectedResult: Attachment section displays the file name, size, and possibly a remove/delete option

steps.action: Click the 'Submit' button to submit the request with the valid attachment
steps.expectedResult: System validates all inputs including the attachment, saves the request to ScheduleChangeRequests table, stores the attachment securely with proper linkage, and displays confirmation message

steps.action: Verify the confirmation message includes details about the attached document
steps.expectedResult: Confirmation message shows request was submitted successfully with attachment information included

postconditions: Schedule change request is saved with status 'Pending'
Valid attachment (under 10MB) is stored securely and linked to the request record
Oversized file was rejected and not stored in the system
Request is available for approver review with the attached document accessible

storyTitle: As Employee, I want to edit my pending schedule change requests to achieve flexibility before approval

testCases.title: Edit pending schedule change request successfully
preconditions: Employee has valid login credentials
Employee has at least one pending schedule change request in the system
Pending request has status 'Pending' and has not been approved or rejected
Scheduling portal is accessible and operational
Approver notification system is configured and operational

steps.action: Log into the scheduling portal using valid employee credentials
steps.expectedResult: Employee is successfully authenticated and redirected to the scheduling portal dashboard

steps.action: Navigate to the 'My Requests' section or menu option
steps.expectedResult: 'My Requests' page is displayed showing a list of all schedule change requests submitted by the employee with their current statuses

steps.action: Identify and click on a pending schedule change request from the list
steps.expectedResult: Request details page opens displaying all current information including date, time, reason, attachments, and an 'Edit' button or option is visible

steps.action: Click the 'Edit' button to enable editing mode
steps.expectedResult: Form fields become editable and the employee can modify the request details

steps.action: Update the 'Date' field with a new valid future date
steps.expectedResult: Date field accepts the new date and displays it correctly

steps.action: Update the 'Reason' field with modified or additional explanation
steps.expectedResult: Reason field accepts the updated text without validation errors

steps.action: Optionally update or add a new attachment within the 10MB size limit
steps.expectedResult: New attachment is uploaded successfully and displayed, or existing attachment is replaced

steps.action: Click the 'Submit' or 'Save Changes' button to save the updated request
steps.expectedResult: System validates the updated data within 2 seconds, saves changes to ScheduleChangeRequests table, creates a version history entry, and displays confirmation message

steps.action: Verify the confirmation message indicates successful update
steps.expectedResult: Confirmation message displays stating 'Request updated successfully' or similar with updated timestamp

steps.action: Verify that approvers receive notification of the updated request
steps.expectedResult: Notification is sent to the assigned approver(s) indicating the request has been modified, and notification is logged in the system

steps.action: Navigate back to 'My Requests' and verify the updated request shows the new information
steps.expectedResult: Updated request displays the modified date, reason, and attachment with a new timestamp indicating when it was last updated

postconditions: Schedule change request is updated in the ScheduleChangeRequests table with new values
Version history record is created capturing the previous state and the changes made
Request status remains 'Pending'
Approvers are notified of the update via configured notification channels
Updated request is available for approver review with the latest information
Audit trail shows who made the changes and when

testCases.title: Prevent editing of approved requests
preconditions: Employee has valid login credentials
Employee has at least one schedule change request with status 'Approved' in the system
Scheduling portal is accessible and operational
Employee is authenticated and logged into the portal

steps.action: Navigate to the 'My Requests' section after successful login
steps.expectedResult: 'My Requests' page displays all schedule change requests including those with 'Approved' status

steps.action: Identify a schedule change request with status 'Approved' from the list
steps.expectedResult: Approved request is visible in the list with status clearly marked as 'Approved'

steps.action: Click on the approved schedule change request to view details
steps.expectedResult: Request details page opens showing all information including date, time, reason, attachments, and approval details

steps.action: Verify that the 'Edit' button is either disabled, hidden, or not present for the approved request
steps.expectedResult: No 'Edit' option is available for the approved request, or if present, it is visually disabled (grayed out)

steps.action: If an 'Edit' button is visible but disabled, attempt to click on it
steps.expectedResult: System prevents the edit action and displays an appropriate message such as 'Approved requests cannot be edited' or 'This request has already been approved and cannot be modified'

steps.action: Attempt to directly access the edit functionality via URL manipulation (if applicable) by modifying the URL to include edit parameters for the approved request
steps.expectedResult: System denies access and redirects to an error page or displays a message stating 'You do not have permission to edit this request' or 'Only pending requests can be edited'

steps.action: Verify that the request details remain unchanged and no edit form is displayed
steps.expectedResult: Request details are displayed in read-only mode with no editable fields, and the approved status is maintained

postconditions: Approved schedule change request remains unchanged in the database
Request status remains 'Approved'
No version history entry is created for the approved request
System security prevents unauthorized modification of approved requests
Employee is informed that approved requests cannot be edited

storyTitle: As Employee, I want to receive notifications about my schedule change request status to achieve timely awareness

testCases.title: Verify employee receives notification on status change
preconditions: Employee is logged into the system
Employee has submitted a schedule change request
Schedule change request is in 'Pending' status
Approver has appropriate permissions to approve requests
Notification service is operational
Employee has default notification preferences enabled (email and in-app)

steps.action: Log in as an approver with appropriate permissions
steps.expectedResult: Approver successfully logs in and can access the schedule change request approval dashboard

steps.action: Navigate to the pending schedule change requests list
steps.expectedResult: List of pending schedule change requests is displayed, including the employee's request

steps.action: Select the employee's schedule change request from the list
steps.expectedResult: Request details are displayed with option to approve, reject, or request more information

steps.action: Change the schedule change request status to 'Approved' and submit the decision
steps.expectedResult: Status is updated to 'Approved' in the system and confirmation message is displayed to approver

steps.action: Verify notification is triggered and sent to the employee within 1 minute
steps.expectedResult: System logs show notification was sent successfully to the employee via configured channels (email and in-app)

steps.action: Log in as the employee who submitted the request
steps.expectedResult: Employee successfully logs in to the system

steps.action: Check in-app notifications by clicking on the notification icon
steps.expectedResult: In-app notification is displayed showing the schedule change request has been approved with clear status details including request ID, date, and approval information

steps.action: Check employee's email inbox for notification email
steps.expectedResult: Email notification is received containing clear information about the approved status, request details, and any next steps required

steps.action: Click on the notification link or navigate to schedule change requests section
steps.expectedResult: Employee is directed to the schedule change request details page

steps.action: View the schedule change request details in the system
steps.expectedResult: Request status is displayed as 'Approved' with timestamp of approval and approver information visible

postconditions: Schedule change request status is 'Approved' in the system
Employee has received and viewed notification via both email and in-app channels
Notification delivery is logged in the system audit trail
Employee is aware of the approved status and can proceed with schedule changes

testCases.title: Test employee notification preference settings
preconditions: Employee is logged into the system
Employee has an active account with notification preferences accessible
Employee has at least one schedule change request in the system
Notification service is operational
Employee currently has both email and in-app notifications enabled by default

steps.action: Log in as the employee
steps.expectedResult: Employee successfully logs in and is directed to the dashboard

steps.action: Navigate to user profile settings by clicking on profile icon or settings menu
steps.expectedResult: Profile settings page is displayed with various configuration options

steps.action: Locate and click on 'Notification Preferences' or 'Notifications' section
steps.expectedResult: Notification preferences page is displayed showing available notification channels and options

steps.action: Review current notification settings for schedule change requests
steps.expectedResult: Current settings show both 'Email Notifications' and 'In-App Notifications' are enabled (checked)

steps.action: Uncheck or toggle off the 'Email Notifications' option for schedule change request updates
steps.expectedResult: Email notification checkbox is unchecked while in-app notification remains checked

steps.action: Click 'Save' or 'Update Preferences' button to save the changes
steps.expectedResult: Success message is displayed confirming 'Notification preferences saved successfully' and settings are persisted in the database

steps.action: Refresh the notification preferences page to verify persistence
steps.expectedResult: Email notifications remain disabled and in-app notifications remain enabled, confirming preferences were saved correctly

steps.action: Log out and log back in as an approver
steps.expectedResult: Approver successfully logs in with appropriate permissions

steps.action: Navigate to the employee's schedule change request and change its status (e.g., from 'Pending' to 'Approved' or 'Rejected')
steps.expectedResult: Status change is successfully processed and saved in the system

steps.action: Wait for notification processing (up to 1 minute) and verify notification delivery logs
steps.expectedResult: System logs show in-app notification was sent but email notification was not sent, respecting employee's preferences

steps.action: Log back in as the employee
steps.expectedResult: Employee successfully logs in to the system

steps.action: Check in-app notifications by clicking on the notification icon
steps.expectedResult: In-app notification is displayed showing the status change with clear details about the new status

steps.action: Check employee's email inbox for any notification emails
steps.expectedResult: No email notification is received for this status change, confirming email notifications are disabled as per preferences

steps.action: Verify the notification contains only in-app delivery and no email was sent by checking notification delivery logs
steps.expectedResult: Audit logs confirm only in-app notification was delivered, email notification was skipped based on user preferences

postconditions: Employee notification preferences are updated with email notifications disabled
Employee receives only in-app notifications for schedule change request status updates
No email notifications are sent to the employee for schedule change requests
Notification preference changes are logged in the system
Employee can still access all status updates through in-app notifications
